title: Viewing update as a threat
body: hello, my virus scanner keeps saying that the file      c:\riot games\league of legends\rads\projects\league_client\releases\0.0.0.56\deploy\plugins\rcp-be-lol-champ-select-legacy\rcp-be-lol-champ-select-legacy.dll     is a  pua.safe.installer. infection.  This is the 1st time I have ever had any league files from an update appear as a threat before so I was wondering if I should find a way for my anti-virus to allow it or is this not actually a real league file and is somehow a piece of malware?

replies.body: i have the same thing and i am very concerned i was conflicted with what to do and this is a first for me as well. maybe a rouge file but i refuse to trust anything my computer tells me is a malware i do not want to be hacked or anything of the sort until riot tells us what the hell this is
My program deleted this file and now my client doesn't work. First attempt at repairing the file did not succeed either.

Wow, that's frustrating to hear.  :(  Thanks for the heads up on this, though.  Go through your antivirus settings and our [patching issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq7) guide to make sure that league is being added as an exception.  After that, you may need to [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) the game since the patcher won't be able to work with missing game files.  Let me know how that works for you.

Same here, I'm also using webroot, I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling and have used the hextech repair tool. Currently my webroot antivirus has "rcp-be-lol-champ-select-legacy.dll" on quarantine, and is blocking the file c:\riot games\league of legends\rads\projects\league_client\releases\0.0.0.56\deploy\plugins\rcp-be-lol-champ-select-legacy\rcp-be-lol-champ-select-legacy.dll is it safe to allow? Please{{item:3151}} {{item:3070}}
Yeah, it's safe.  It seems that this specific antivirus was blocking league, so allowing it as an exception should fix it up.  Thanks for the report!

I've been seeing a few of these reports on the megathread.  What antivirus are you running?  In the meantime, the steps in our[ patching issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq7)could help get this resolved.   Let me know if it helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=I3MlTa7j,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-03-08T16:59:03.444+0000)
>
> I've been seeing a few of these reports on the megathread.  What antivirus are you running?  In the meantime, the steps in our[ patching issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq7)could help get this resolved.   Let me know if it helps!

So far nothing has worked. I have even uninstalled and reinstalled. It always catches out that one file for some reason.  Even when i told it to allow all files from riot.  I'm currently using  Webroot SecureAnywere v9.0.15.40
im using webroot and now it says the client is a win32 user add as well did sometbing happen last night cause tbis never happened b4

Yeah, I'm thinking that particular antivirus is having issues recognizing League as an exception.  This is based on the reports I've seen so far this morning.   For now, add exceptions to allow League to go through which our [ patching issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)guide.  I'll definitely share more info as it comes to me!

This error can happen if you have an unstable connection while reaching our patching servers.  You'll want to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get that fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!

First of all thank oyu for your response. But ate 92 % send a error:

- It says "Update failed; Unspecified error occured, please check the logs.
i usewebroot and it now tells me the client itself is a win32 user add and im so concerned about this i wonder if sonething halpened at riot cause ik more people are having this
